alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 2:13PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz County through 300 PM MST... At 213 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Parker, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bouse. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 30. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 129 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
